hms.comment.expand_me: Feel free to copy all text in this file and translate it to other languages. If you want, provide them to me so I can add them to the official pack download :)
language.name: English
datapack.hms.name: Vanilla Hammers and Excavators
text.hms.help.description: This is a simple datapack that adds hammers and excavators. These tools allow the player to dig in a 3x3 area of blocks. You can obtain them by combining 2 %s with %s by %s.
text.hms.first_reload.description: Options were set to default! For more info, use: %s
text.hms.options.change_tool_slowdown.de: Tools infused with %s fully negate the slowdown.
text.hms.options.break_utility_blocks.de: Break things like furnaces, dispensers, etc.
warning.hms.do_tile_drops_off: Warning! This pack does not work if tile drops are off. Please turn them back on if you want to continue using this pack. (or click this text)
item.hms.resonance_core.description2: Throw on a smithing table with a
item.hms.resonance_core.description3: large tool to infuse its powers.
